title: Amazing Golden Triangle Loft with Expansive City and Mountain Views!
posting_body: Welcome home to this unique, spacious home!
This light bright urban loft has double height ceilings, hardwood floors, high end kitchen appliances and finishes, expansive windows, and magnificent city and mountain views!
The primary bedroom is loft style with an en-suite bathroom and a huge walk-in closet.
On the main level there is a separate office and another full bathroom!
This open concept home offers so much space to call your own!
The home is finished in a contemporary, artisic style!
The living room has a gas fireplace, west facing windows, a gas fireplace, a wall mounted tv and access to the balcony.
The balcony is on the west facing side of the building, you could watch the sunset from your private balcony everyday!
The kitchen has granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, contemporary cabinetry, plenty of space for storage and an island with bar seating!
Adjacent to the kitchen is the beautiful dining room with a generous table looking out to a spectacular view of the city including the remarkable architecture of the Denver Art Museum.
The main floor also offers an open area prefect as an office and works well as a library or creative space.
There is a full bathroom on the first floor for the convenience of your guests.
Golden Triangle is a wonderful, inspiring, centrally located neighborhood that offers amazing dining, shopping and entertainment options!
Within walking distance you have the Denver Art Museum, numerous galleries, wonderful parks, coffee shops, restaurants, Chrerry Creek trail and the 16th Street mall!
Commuting is a breeze, a quick walk downtown or to the light rail, a short drive to Cherry Creek, DTC and West Denver!
This is truly an opportunity to live in the best Denver has to offer!
** Washer/Dryer Included
** 1 Car Garage Space
** Background check required
** $39.95/adult background check fee
No Pets Please
** Available for 12 months or longer
** Tenant pays electric, cable and internet
** Specific lease terms and conditions are subject to owner’s approval prior to lease execution
Exclusively Listed by Meredith Loux with Colorado & Company Real Estate.
